titleStmt.title: The case of Robert Balch of Bridgwater gent., sitting member of Parliament for the borough of Bridgwater, in the county of Sommerset, petitioned against by John Gardner of London merchant.
The case of Robert Balch of Bridgwater gent., sitting member of Parliament for the borough of Bridgwater, in the county of Sommerset, petitioned against by John Gardner of London merchant.
titleStmt.author: Balch, Robert.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: To be heard before the Committee of Elections on Friday the 2nd of December, 1692.
Reproduction of the original in the Lincoln's Inn Library.
